Settings Save Cancel Tags (comma separated) The max number of tags that can be auto assigned to a note. Minimum 0, Maximum 5 No notes, press the button in the bottom right to create a note! sort notes Note successfully added Date Time Notification:
Welcome to QuickNotes! Your intelligent note companion. Let\'s get you started with a quick tour of the key features. Create Your First Note Tap the + button to create a new note. You can add a title, content, and tags to organize your thoughts. Search Your Notes Use the search bar to quickly find notes by title, content, or tags. As you create more notes, this becomes invaluable! Filter with Tags Tags appear here when you add them to notes. Tap any tag to filter your notes and stay organized. Try Demo Notes Want to see the app in action? Long-press the + button to add some example notes you can play with. Explore Advanced Features Visit Settings to enable AI-powered auto-tagging, customize tag colors, and set up note reminders! Next Skip Try it! Replay Tutorial Please grant permission to schedule exact alarms for notifications Unable to schedule exact alarms. Please grant permission in system settings.
